mapper.select: select distinct cateCode from lectureboard where lectureNo in(select lectureNo from classbylecture) and classCode in (select classCode from classMember where email=#{email})

select distinct subcateCode from lectureboard where lectureNo in(select lectureNo from classbylecture) and classCode in (select classCode from classMember where email=#{email}) and cateCode=#{cateCode}

select * from lectureboard where lectureNo in(select lectureNo from classbylecture) and classCode in (select classCode from classMember where email=#{email}) and cateCode=#{cateCode} and subcateCode=#{subcateCode}

select * from lectureboard where lectureNo in(select lectureNo from classbylecture) and classCode in (select classCode from classMember where email=#{email}) and cateCode=#{cateCode} ORDER BY lectureNo desc limit 4
